Key Match Events: Zach McKinstry's fielding error led to an unearned run in the first inning.
Tyler Holton struggled to record an out, allowing multiple runs early in the game.
Reese Olson gave up a three-run homer to Lane Thomas in the first inning.
The Tigers couldn't get anything going against Cleveland's bullpen, who combined for 4 1/3 hitless innings.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager A.J. Hinch expressed frustration with the early mistakes and the bullpen performance.
Players like Parker Meadows and Tarik Skubal were mentioned as key figures moving forward.
